summary.question: Why do I need to accept an invoicing mandate?
summary.answer_1: _To avoid headaches._ Our system automatically creates and delivers invoices without you having to lift a finger.
summary.answer_2: _To avoid mistakes._ No more human errors! Our system keeps your invoices accurate and consistent.
summary.answer_3: _To avoid costs._ Automating your invoicing reduces administrative costs.
summary.answer_4: _To be compliant._ We ensure that you’re always up to date on the legal and regulatory requirements.
